tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: KVK taxonomy 2024
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: XBRL taxonomy prepared by the Dutch Chamber of Commerce for filing financial statements and/or declarations in the Netherlands.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: KVK - Annual Report - NL GAAP - Core
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: Entry point to be used by filers for their extension schema of the annual report based on NL GAAP.
